name: The Drying Mat

pages.title: Drying mat
pages.text: Place items on the drying mat in direct sunlight to dry them. Sun drying may take a long time so beware of rain which will reset the timer. Right click an item in the mat to place it. The mat holds up to 4 items. Drying begins as soon as the item is placed on the mat.
